attributes.action: bolish or lower the yearly registration fees that nurses have to pay
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nurses are currently paying over £70 a year just to enable them to work and look after the public.  this is a flat fee whether you work part time or full time.  Nurses fees should be abolished or reduced , or employers should take some responsibility for paying all or part of the fee.
